cards.rules_text:
Prowess
[i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, if that spell was an instant or sorcery, create a tapped colorless artifact token named Star Fragment with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Copy your next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy.”

Other creatures you control have haste.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {R}. If you do, creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
[i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The mist conceals not secrets, but reveals possibilities.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]They say crabs are slow. This one's just thinking really fast.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Goldfire Evoker deals X damage to target opponent where X is that spell's mana value.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It begins as a spark, a flicker of potential, then all burns gold.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, if it was an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy it and choose new targets for it. Otherwise, draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You think you know what'll happen next? How adorable.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Drawn to the glow of magic like flame to a lantern, it flutters through the mind's deepest echoes.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying, Haste
Creatures each opponent controls cannot have indestructible or hexproof as long as Clover is on the battlefield.
Whenever Clover becomes blocked by a creature with greater toughness than its power, Clover gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Walls are tall, and I am small, but one big swing, and they're sure to fall!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i]Innovate —[/i] Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Nettle gains flying until end of turn and deals 2 damage to target creature.
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You call that a light show? Hold my lightning, I'll show you how a groundling gets things done.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
At the beginning of your end step, step, if one or more cards you own were put into exile from anywhere this turn, draw a card
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The echo of a spell is often more insightful than the casting.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, return another target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The lake gives wisdom in echoes and riddles.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Innovate —[/i] Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Ember-Eyed Innovator deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“A theory is only as good as its ignition point.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
[i]Innovate — [/i]Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Books can burn. Ideas duel forever.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Starwright Savant enters create a tapped colorless artifact token named Star Fragment, Star Fragment with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Copy your next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy.”
Whenever you copy a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Starwright Savant.

When Burgundy Spire Initiate enters, exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains in exile.
If the second spell you cast this turn was cast from exile, copy it. You may select new targets for the copy.

Instant and Sorcery spells cast from exile cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, Ashscroll Adept deals 2 damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Only ash can birth new flame.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying, skulk [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Lake-Kin Starglider can't block.
Whenever Lake-Kin Starglider deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

First strike
When Parrying Spellblade enters, copy the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever Parrying Spellblade deals combat damage to an opponent, you may exile it. If you do, return it to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this creature gains first strike until end of turn if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, it gains double strike until end of turn. If it's the third time, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

Flying
[i][i]Magecraft[/i] — [/i]Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“With a chord and a call, we rise above all, answering magic's thrall.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile the top card of your library. You may cast that spell until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, Blightburn Zealot gains double strike until end of turn.

Prowess
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, look at the top card of your library. If it shares a card type with the spell you cast, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The Hearth's truths are best heard through glass and starlight.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Flying
When Arcane Piper enters, counter target noncreature spell an opponent controls, unless they return a permanent they control to their hand.

Prowess, flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue and red Dragon Elemental creature token with flying.

Trample
Mistdrawn Lakewyrm costs {1} less for each instant and/or sorcery cast or copied this turn.
{UR}{UR}: Mistdrawn Lakewyrm gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.
Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change “target” in its text to “each.”)[/i]

This spell deals 3 damage to any target.
If you would copy this spell one or more times, instead copy it that many times plus an additional time. You may choose new targets for the additional copy.
Flashback {2}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Exile the top card of your library. You may cast it until end of turn. If it's an instant or sorcery spell, it costs {1} less to cast. When you cast it from exile this turn, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Destroy target noncreature artifact. Reckoning Bolt deals X damage to target opponent where X is the mana value of the target artifact.
Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options.”
—Maxti, pyromancer[/i]

cards.rules_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A finger of fire from the heavens.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
You may sacrifice a nontoken red creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The original idea was good. Let's make it twice as... impactful.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reveal the top card of your library.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the revealed card's mana value. If a spell is countered this way, you may put the revealed card into your hand or graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She sees what others fear to dream.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“We seek not just knowledge, but the precise tool for the moment.”
—Coralia Trickweaver[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Scry 1 [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]
Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Sometimes our choices leave us wondering what could have been, even as we embrace what will be.” —Griswald, The Lost[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Spree [i](Choose one or more additional costs.)[/i] [i](Choose one or more additional costs.)[/i]
+ {1}{U} — Counter target spell.
+ {3} — Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature you control.
+ {2} — Draw two cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Each step accounts for what was, what is, and what will be.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Until end of turn, for each instant and/or sorcery you cast, you may pay {UR}. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for each copy.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In the shattered remnants of herself, Winry saw every version she never became — and the one that still might rise.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell isn't countered, Recall Surge deals damage to the targeted spell's controller equal to its mana value.

Exile target nonland permanent, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flicker Into Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a Wizard entered the battlefield this way, Flicker Into Flame deals 4 damage to any target instead.
Fireburst Thesis deals 3 damage to each creature. Then if you've cast another spell this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She was told that her methods of study were unorthodox. She just thought of it as something no one else has yet thought of.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each player mills four cards. Exile up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from graveyards. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain in exile, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them. Exile Thought Splinter.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I don't steal thoughts—I finish them.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Brainblast deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard. If X is greater than or equal to four, draw X cards, then discard a card at random.

Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast up to two instant or sorcery cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs until end of turn. If X is five or more, Ignite the Thoughtscape deals X damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The mind burns brightest just before the spark catches.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each player mills three cards. Until end of turn, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from among those cards without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves. Exile Dream Distortion.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The veil between worlds thins, and the past bleeds into the present.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one or both —
• Discard a card, then draw two cards.
• Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The cost of revelation is high, but the price of ignorance is higher.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The path ahead may twist, but contemplation reveals the clearest step.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Until end of turn, whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Spellcrack Eruption deals 2 damage to any target.
Instant and sorcery spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.
cards.flavor_text: [i]They told her she was unstable. She agreed—just not in the way they meant.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Copy the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy.
At the beginning of your end step, create a treasure token for each instant and/or sorcery spell cast or copied this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The Spire teaches that every spell, like every harvest, is richer the second time around.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you control a Wizard, you may exile target nonland permanent instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When one door opens in the Spire, another is erased. Winry was well aware, but entered the portal nonetheless.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Exile the top four cards of your library. For each instant and/or sorcery card exiled this way, Scribe the Endscript deals 3 damage to each opponent. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast the cards exiled this way.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The last words of ancient spells often say more than the first.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Search your library for an instant and/or sorcery. You may cast it this turn without paying its mana cost.
Storm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I've read the old scrolls, walked their ruins, distilled their meaning — and now I shape the next cycle.” —Winry, Ascended Battlemage[/i]

cards.rules_text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. Arcane Conduction deals damage equal to the difference in their powers to the creature you don't control. When that creature dies this turn, copy this spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Latticefire deals 3 damage to up to three target creatures. Then, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost.

Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The heart yearns, the hand grasps, and fate laughs at the cost.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, scry 1.

Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Spellfire Ovation deals 2 damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Why whisper your incantations when you can shout them into flame?[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. Then copy each card exiled with this enchantment. You may cast any number of the copies without paying their mana costs.
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits.”
—Nekusar, the Mindrazer[/i]

cards.rules_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Bound by the roots of ancient trees, the ring hums with the earth's slumbering power. A touch of its amber core awakens the dormant magic within.[/i]
[i]A symbol of a thousand ideas, waiting to be unleashed.[/i]
[i]It holds within it an unsolvable riddle. A creative answer yields an invitation to the guild.[/i]
